content:
Craft an item of type: wheat
inventory=[{"type": "hay_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "lime_terracotta", "quantity": 22, "index": 14}, {"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 40, "index": 22}, {"type": "dark_oak_fence", "quantity": 31, "index": 25}, {"type": "brewing_stand", "quantity": 45, "index": 29}, {"type": "red_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 34, "index": 36}, {"type": "tnt_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "lodestone", "quantity": 14, "index": 43}]
thought: To solve this task I need to craft wheat. Wheat requires placing 1 hay_block in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the hay_block from slot 13 into the crafting grid.
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: wheat
inventory=[{"type": "wheat", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "hay_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "lime_terracotta", "quantity": 22, "index": 14}, {"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 40, "index": 22}, {"type": "dark_oak_fence", "quantity": 31, "index": 25}, {"type": "brewing_stand", "quantity": 45, "index": 29}, {"type": "red_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 34, "index": 36}, {"type": "tnt_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "lodestone", "quantity": 14, "index": 43}]
thought: Now I can craft the wheat by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9
